item.title: About the Host (Who is bebechien?)
item.description:
üåè From Seoul to Tokyo

Hello! I am bebechien, coding the future from a corner of my room in Tokyo.

I dream of a “virtual world more real than reality”. To build the world I dreamed of as a child, I have been rolling through the frontlines of technology‚Äîcrossing boundaries between hardware, platforms, and AI.

This blog is my personal treasure chest, filled with interesting tech fragments I‚Äôve picked up along that journey, and a space to chat with all of you.
